title: Which website is the best for the previous years question papers for grade 10th? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hiii… To score well in your class 10… 1.) Start giving equal importance to all the subjects. 2.) Focus mainly on NCERT BOOKS(considering CBSE) And now about your question:…you can google it and u will find many sites….however…i am giving some of them…u can refer these also… 1.) http://cbse.nic>last year papers 2.)http://vedantu.com>previous year papers 3.)http://embibe.com>previous year papers 4.)http://ncerthelp.com>questions papers However….cbse site would be much more trustable compared to other…. All the very best…!!!

User-13784532804310797192, this is not a website but an app. Oyeexams Available at Google Play Store can help you to make 10th Board exam easy. They provide: For 10th, 12th (Science, Commerce and Humanities) 1. Previous 12 years solved papers. 2. All papers in offline download. NO Internet required every time. 3. Graphical pattern analysis of each subject. 4. Trend analysis of each chapter. 5. All textbooks All these are for free. So it's time to study smart and stay ahead. Some of their screenshots are:
